description:
Picnicking with an Opinel just got a lot easier. Opinel has added a clever fork and spoon insert to their iconic No. 08 pocketknife, bringing a little civility to your camp kitchen or lunch kit. Known for their ergonomics, the Opinel cutlery set feels great in you hand. When you aren’t using the fork or spoon, the No. 08 is a great pocketknife, because you never know when you’ll need to roast a marshmallow.

  • Designed in collaboration with Franck Fontana, this clever little kit is easy to use and easy to bring along
  • 12C27 Sandvik stainless steel blade is corrosion resistant, holds an edge well, and is easy to sharpen
  • Beech wood handle is rugged, durable, and gets better with age
  • Fork, knife, and spoon all lock in place with a twist collar for safety
  • Microfibre travel case included
name: Opinel Pinic+ Cutlery Complete Set with No 8 Knife
